what: sf object geometry column name — sf_geometry_name
title: sf object geometry column name — sf_geometry_name
text: Get geometry column name sf object

title: sf object geometry column name — sf_geometry_name
sf object geometry column name — sf_geometry_name
sf object geometry column name — sf_geometry_name
sf object geometry column name — sf_geometry_name
code: library(sf) #> Linking to GEOS 3.10.2, GDAL 3.4.1, PROJ 8.2.1; sf_use_s2() is TRUE snnu = read_sf(system.file('extdata/snnu.geojson',package = 'sdsfun')) sf_geometry_name(snnu) #> [1] "geometry"

title: generates voronoi diagram — sf_voronoi_diagram
text: Generates Voronoi diagram (Thiessen polygons) sf object

title: generates voronoi diagram — sf_voronoi_diagram
text: sf objects (multi-)point type supported generate voronoi diagram returned result includes geometry column.

title: generates voronoi diagram — sf_voronoi_diagram
code: library(sf) pts = read_sf(system.file('extdata/pts.gpkg',package = 'sdsfun')) pts_v = sf_voronoi_diagram(pts)  library(ggplot2) ggplot() +   geom_sf(data = pts_v, color = 'red',           fill = 'transparent') +   geom_sf(data = pts, color = 'blue', size = 1.25) +   theme_void()

title: generates sppatial weight matrix — spdep_swm
text: Generates spatial weight matrix based contiguity distance via spdep package.

title: generates sppatial weight matrix — spdep_swm
code: spdep_swm(   sfj,   queen = TRUE,   k = NULL,   order = 1L,   cumulate = TRUE,   style = "W",   zero.policy = TRUE )

title: generates sppatial weight matrix — spdep_swm
text: sfj sf object. queen (optional) TRUE, using queen contiguity, otherwise rook contiguity. Default TRUE. k (optional) number nearest neighbours. Ignore parameter using contiguity based spatial weights; Otherwise distance based spatial weights used. order (optional) order adjacency object. Default 1. cumulate (optional) Whether accumulate adjacency objects. Default TRUE. style (optional) style can take values W, B, C, S. see spdep::nb2mat(). Default W. zero.policy (optional)  FALSE stop error empty neighbour sets, TRUE permit weights list formed zero-length weights vectors. Default TRUE.

title: generates sppatial weight matrix — spdep_swm
code: library(sf) pts = read_sf(system.file('extdata/pts.gpkg',package = 'sdsfun'))  wt1 = spdep_swm(pts, k = 6, style = 'B') wt2 = spdep_swm(pts, queen = TRUE, style = 'B') wt2 = spdep_swm(pts, queen = FALSE, order = 2, style = 'B')
